platform.title: 2. Platform Description
platform.paragraph1: PredIQ.fun is a decentralized prediction market platform that allows users to create, trade, and resolve prediction markets on various topics including politics, sports, cryptocurrency, economics, and current events. The platform operates using blockchain technology and smart contracts.
platform.paragraph2: The Platform provides informational content about current events and allows users to engage with prediction markets through self-directed blockchain transactions. We do not operate as a traditional exchange and do not have control over your transactions or funds.
